Specification: Offering an elevated position on a generous corner lot; this desirable single-storey home that boast three bedrooms with built-in robes is the epitome of family-friendly living. Set on approx. 450sqm and located so close to elite schools as well as the iconic The Glen Shopping Centre, this desirable residence ensures convenience and offers great privacy from the street. ,Step inside to discover Tasmanian Oak floorboards that span the light-filled northern eastern-facing lounge, living, meals, and kitchen areas; that is separated by elegant French doors that exude a sense of space and versatility - ideal for both everyday living and entertaining whilst providing warmth and inviting ambiance for relaxation and gatherings. ,The kitchen, adorned with exquisite Caesarstone and 2Pac cabinetry finish, offers ample bench space and is equipped with Asko and Blanco 900mm oven/gas stainless steel appliances, making meal preparation a delight. Overlooking a private backyard adorned with vibrant flora, this culinary haven is a place where every cooking session transforms into a joyous culinary adventure.,You could also venture outdoors to your own low-maintenance landscaped backyard from the two bedrooms whilst enjoying outdoor living all year round. Also, make the most of a pristine family bathroom with a separate toilet, Daikin A/C unit in the lounge room and two bedrooms, laundry, great drying courtyard area off laundry, security door, rainwater tank, double carport with side gate access to the courtyard and a large shed for storage. ,Zoned for Highvale Secondary College and Highvale Primary School (STSA), you're also located so close to Highview Park, Larpent Reserve, Glen Waverley North Reserve, Wesley College, Vermont South Shopping Centre, Burwood One, Kingsway shops, buses, Glen Waverley Station, and Eastlink.

Presenting an unparalleled fusion of contemporary space and modern convenience, this remarkable townhouse offers an enticing prospect for those desiring a lifestyle of low-maintenance ease. Upon entering, neutral tones, high ceilings and beautiful natural light establish a welcoming atmosphere throughout an inviting lounge, preceding an open-plan living/dining zone including a luxurious kitchen appointed with stone surfaces, island bench, Bosch appliances and WIP. Appreciate the flexibility of ground and upper-level main bedrooms each fitted with robes and luxe ensuite, complemented by 2 further robed bedrooms, retreat and stylish twin bathroom. Exceptional comfort is ensured with the inclusion of ducted heating, split system AC, private entertaining deck, open study, alarm, video intercom and secure gated access to a double garage. Revel in the epitome of stress-free living, positioned in the Glendal Primary School zone, close to Wesley College, Burwood One, The Glen, transport, reserves, Monash Freeway and EastLink.

Shimmering with superior style and space beyond its double entry doors, this glamorous home sits elevated at lucky number 8 and offers a lifestyle of sunlit brilliance in the Pinewood Primary and Glen Waverley Secondary Zones (STSA). ,Visually stunning with a clear view down the center of the home, the residence reflects elegance and opulence with gleaming chandeliers illuminating the home whilst a formal lounge room reflects comfort with a decorative fireplace and plush carpet. Continuing further into the home you'll pass by a private study before arriving at the open plan dining zone, family room and carpeted rumpus room. ,Adding to the glamour of the room is a gourmet kitchen containing stone benches, an island breakfast bench, 900mm oven/gas stove, semi-integrated dishwasher, walk-in pantry plus a 2nd kitchen with gas stove and dishwasher. Stretching out to the side of the home, an alfresco zone awaits gatherings with friends alongside an open-air entertaining space and lush, landscaped backyard. ,Perfect for the large family or those accommodating extended family members, the ground floor contains two robed bedrooms that are connected via a central 2-way ensuite. Upstairs, a northerly oriented retreat spills out onto a balcony, while the remaining four bedrooms all feature a walk-in-robe and ensuite, with the grand master bedroom boasting a huge walk-in-robe, private balcony and lavish, dual vanity spa ensuite. ,Finished to perfection with a powder room, laundry, coat room, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, alarm, video intercom, high ceilings, Rinnai solar hot water system plus a double garage and three driveway parking spaces. ,Resting close to Pinewood Primary, Glen Waverley Secondary, Huntingtower School, Wesley College, Holmesglen Institute, Monash Aquatic Centre, Scotchmans Creek Trail, buses, trains and Monash Freeway.

This sweet vanilla brick veneer and its grand front verandah would have been a showpiece in its day. Now that proud history makes way for a promising future on an 810sqms (approx.) allotment along the park.,A superb top of the court position backing onto Brentwood Reserve puts you in walking distance to lovely green space, Code 5 café, Brentwood Secondary College and White Lanes Tennis Club, offering impressive access to the district’s lifestyle attributes.,The mid-century home presents in neat original condition, with updated central heating and cooling, s/s Fisher & Paykel dishwasher and bright living space and bedrooms – with a north-west facing aspect designed to capture morning and afternoon light.,For investors wanting to make plans to develop, the lease potential is high with REIV recording 4-bedroom median weekly rent at $698 in Glen Waverley.  ,Outside, the generous block invites vision for growth with potential to build a new family home or two town houses (STCA) in this family friendly pocket of Glen Waverley, just a short drive to The Glen’s shopping, dining and transport hub, esteemed Caulfield Grammar, M1 and Eastlink connections, and Monash Aquatic Centre and its 6 pools.

Experience the epitome of modern living with this stunning Galleria apartment that bathes in northerly sunshine and showcases a contemporary, carefree design in the heart of Glen Waverley, beside The Glen Shopping Centre. Taking place on the 4th floor, the apartment's modern aesthetic invites you in to discover an open plan living, dining and kitchen boasting sleek floorboards, stone benches, Ilve gas stove, Ilve oven, integrated Fisher & Paykel dishwasher plus a concealed fridge space. Floor-to-ceiling windows welcome in the northerly sunshine and offer a streamlined connection out onto the covered balcony where you can relax in the sunshine. Carpet in the two bedrooms adds to the apartments sense of comfort, with one of the bedrooms boasting a study nook and private balcony, while both bedrooms include mirrored built-in-robes. Continuing to impress, the bathroom benefits from floor-to-ceiling tiles, while added extras include a Euro laundry, extensive storage, video intercom entry, reverse cycle heating/air-conditioning, double-glazed windows plus a basement parking space and storage area. Directly opposite The Glen Shopping Centre in the sought-after Glen Waverley Secondary College Catchment (STSA), walking distance to Glen Waverley Primary, Wesley College, Kingsway restaurants, Village Cinemas, Strike Bowling, Glen Waverley Station and buses. ,Photo ID required at all open for inspections.

This prestigious home presents an abundance of luxury and space situated in the Brentwood Secondary School Zone.,Superbly presented, this home is filled with style, sophistication and warmth.,Double doored entry opens into an impressive entry foyer that flows over French Oak parquetry flooring and leads past the study and living/entertainment room where recessed speakers are accompanied by a projector and comforting carpet.,With double height ceiling and soaring windows draw northerly sunshine into the family room, set beside the grandeur dining area and state-of-the-art kitchen incorporating a massive island bench ,soft closing cabinets ,Fisher & Paykel appliances, bosch dishwasher, double ovens and 900 mm gas stove . Adjacent is a spacious Butler's Kitchen and pantry including a bosch dishwasher.,Designed for entertaining the clever additions of a bi-fold servery window that allows the chef to serve food out to the undercover alfresco area which opens to the family room with a sliding doors. .In addition is this north facing backyard with low maintence garden perfect for the family to enjoy.,On the ground floor at the rear of the home is a guest room /6th bedroom which boasts a walk-in-robe and ensuite with a dual vanity and double shower , further accompanied by a powder room and laundry with large benchtop and walk-in linen press. A wide staircase with a view of a beautiful ceiling chandelier leads to the fully carpeted spacious retreat and five remaining bedrooms all with their own walk-in-robes and ensuites, including the lavish master bedroom fit for a queen featuring an adjoining  retreat,  grand dressing room and luxurious ensuite with dual vanities, sumptuous freestanding bathtub, rainfall effect shower and separate toilet.,Extra luxuries include High ceilings, remote driveway gates , ducted heating, evaporative cooling, CCTV cameras, video intercom, LED downlights, remote curtain,walk-in storage room plus a double garage with internal access.,Walking distance to Brentwood Secondary College and Glen Waverley South Primary, near Caulfield Grammar,  Monash Uni, Central Reserve, Monash Aquatic Centre, Brandon Park Shopping Centre, The Glen, buses, trains and freeways.,Photo ID required at all open inspections

Dedicated to design excellence whilst delivering the highest level of luxury, this near new home indulges every aspect in life whilst promoting premium appointments, CBD views and prized placement in the Mount View Primary and Glen Waverley Secondary Zones (STSA). ,A celebration of quality craftsmanship, the home unfolds to reveal glamorous parquetry flooring that guides you through to a formal lounge room boasting designer lighting plus a Heat & Glo gas log fire.
